p: A total of 72 healthy Swiss albino mice of either sex weighing 25–35 g; aging 6–8 weeks were used for the study. All animals were housed under room temperature (at 22 ± 3°C), and 12 h light and dark cycles. Animals had free access to feed with a standard pellet diet and water ad libitum. Animals were acclimatized for one week prior to the experiment.
